items.content:
• In this lesson we are going to listen, watch short movies, do some grammar and finally you will do a short grammar test.
  • Don't forget to put all the scores of the exercises, you make in this lesson, in your workplan Shopping.
  • First listen to the explanation of the teacher about the Simple present and the Present continuous.

Fiona and John are in a clothes shop this time. Fiona is trying on a pair of jeans. The first time you listen, there is only one question:


Does Fiona buy the jeans? Why (not)?

Now listen a second time:

  • First start the recording
  • Click on start - below
  • Answer the following questions whilst listening

prompt.body:
John: How did you get on?
Fiona:

content.body: So what do you think? Do they suit me?
They feel tight, have they got the next size up on the shelf?

prompt.body:
John: Let's see. No, that's the largest size they have.<br xmlns="" />
Fiona:

content.body: So what do you think? Do they suit me?
They feel tight, have they got the next size up on the shelf?

prompt.body:
John: Well they are nice jeans, but I'm not sure if they're really you.
Fiona:

content.body: So what do you think? Do they suit me?
They feel tight, have they got the next size up on the shelf?

prompt.body:
John: They make you look too fat.
Fiona:

content.body: So what do you think? Do they suit me?
They feel tight, have they got the next size up on the shelf?

items.content:
Clothes shop
John: How did you get on?
Fiona: I don't know, they feel tight. Have they got the next size up on the shelf?
John: Let's see. No, that's the largest size they have.
Fiona: So what do you think? Do they suit me?
John: Well, they are nice jeans, but I don't know if they're really you.
Fiona: Why, what's wrong with them?
John: They make you look too fat.
Fiona: OK. I'll leave them then.

Vocabulary!
What do the following words from the listening mean?

  • To get on
  • To suit
  • To leave
  • Tight
  • The next size up

Some other useful shopping phrases:

  • Excuse me.
  • Have you got it / them in blue?
  • Can I try it / them on?
  • I take a size 8.
  • Have you got a bigger one?
  • Have you got the next size up / down?
  • They fit great.
  • They fit / it fits. (the right size)
  • They suit / it suits you. (are the right 'look' for you)
  • It / they are really you. (are the right 'look' for you)
  • What's wrong with it / them? (Why don't you like it / them?)
  • I'll take it / them please. (I want to buy it / them)
  • I'll leave it / them thanks. (I don't want to buy it / them)

Watch and Listen to the next two short movies.

Try to remember as many words as you hear or know.

Write new words in your notebook to learn at home.

Weet je het nog: de simple present?
Bestudeer in de kennisbank Engels wanneer en hoe je de simple present gebruikt. Grammar: Simple present
Maak nu de volgende twee oefeningen:

prompt.body:
Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

I ..... (to like) big cities

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

We ...... footbal every Saturday.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

The Earth ..... (to turn) around the Sun.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Peggy ..... (to live) in London.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

It ..... (to cost) a lot to stay at luxury hotels.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

We ..... (to have) a shower every day.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

It ..... (to rain) a lot in winter.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

They ..... (to start) work at 9 a.m. every day.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

You never ..... (to eat) breakfast.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Margaret ..... (to speak) four languages.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

Tina is a teacher. She ..... (to teach) French to young children.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

I always ...... in this chair.

Welke vorm van het werkwoord moet worden ingevuld?

My parents always ....... to France.

content.body:
Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • That man (to work) in a shoe factory.
  • It never (to rain) here in summer.
  • We sometimes (to walk) along the beach.
  • This (to be) a very easy exercise.
  • Mary (to like) the smell of roses.
  • I (to come) home early every day.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • The man often (to hurry) to his work.
  • You (to look) like Cindy Crawford!
  • I dance every weekend. Penny every weekend.
  • I wash clothes on Sunday. Susan clothes on Saturday.
  • I write letters every day. Dave emails every day.

Vul de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • I box well. Mike very well.
  • I go to school by bus. Jill to school by bus.
  • I always kiss mum goodbye. She always mum goodbye.
  • I mix the eggs with the butter. Jane the eggs with the butter.
  • I teach French. Mr. Johnsson English.

items.content:
Weet je het nog: de present continuous?
Bestudeer in de kennisbank Engels het volgende onderdeel: Grammar: De -ing vorm - Present Continuous
In de volgende oefening is in de vraag steeds de present continuous gebruikt.
Weet jij hoe je antwoordt?

  • Vraag en antwoord

Maak nu de volgende oefeningen.

content.body:
Deze oefening gaat over de &#39;present continuous&#39;.
Je krijgt een aantal zinnen met &#39;gaten&#39; te zien.
Welke woorden moeten ingevuld worden?
Vul steeds de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • I (watch) an interesting movie.
  • Sue (read) a book.
  • We (play) football.
  • They (work) at the moment.

Deze oefening gaat over de 'present continuous'.
Je krijgt een aantal zinnen met 'gaten' te zien.
Welke woorden moeten ingevuld worden?
Vul steeds de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • He (stand) on his head.
  • I (cycling) to school.
  • The weather (get) better.
  • Look! Sam and Tom (play) football.

Deze oefening gaat over de &amp;amp;amp;#39;present continuous&amp;amp;amp;#39;.
Je krijgt een aantal zinnen met &amp;amp;amp;#39;gaten&amp;amp;amp;#39; te zien.
Welke woorden moeten ingevuld worden?
Vul steeds de juiste vorm van het werkwoord in.

  • The teacher (explain) the lesson.
  • Listen! Susan (play) the guitar.
  • We (go) to my sister's tomorrow.
  • You (swim) with our clothes on.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?
In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: He likes standing on his head.
He is standing on his head.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: The weather has been getting better.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: What are you doing this evening?
What will you be doing this evening?

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: The number of accidents is falling rapidly
The number of accidents falls every year.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?
In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: Is he watching an interesting movie?
Has he been watching an interesting movie?

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: I have been repairing my bike.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: Come on, we're waiting for you.
Come on, we have been waiting for you.

prompt.body: In welke zin is de present continuous gebruikt?

content.body: We're going to my sister's tomorrow.
We go to my sister's tomorrow.

prompt.body:
Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

I ... (work) in an office from 9 to 5, but at the moment I ... (work not).

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Every day Sarah ... (go) to school by bus but now she ... (cycle) to school.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Sam, what ... you ... (do)? I ... (swim) with my clothes on.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

James normally ... (work) as a butler but now he ... (play) football.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Listen! Susan ... (play) the guitar. She always ... (practise) on Sundays.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

I ... (drink) a lot of cola, but now I ... (drink) a pint of beer.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Compaq ... (make) computers and Philips also ... (make) computers.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Look! Sam ... (play) football. He never ... (play) football.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Sshht, i ... (watch) TV. You know that I always ... (watch) TV on Saturdays.

Zet de werkwoorden tussen haakjes in de juiste tijd.

Usually he ... (watch) a video at home but now he ... (watch) a film in the cinema.

items.content:
Je sluit het onderdeel Grammar af met een Grammar test.
Als je het certificaat haalt, ben je klaar voor de volgende stap.

Good luck!

prompt.body:
Goed of fout?
I I don't have any money.
II Marina will give us any information.

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:
Goed of fout?
I Hanna shouldn't smoke some cigarettes.
II Sue must do some homework tonight.

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:

II Have you cleaned up anything yet?

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:
Goed of fout?
I much people
II many food

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:
Goed of fout?
I There wasn't much he could do.

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:
Goed of fout?
I He didn't have much choice.
II We need some tea. How many do we need?

content.body: I en II zijn beide goed.
I is goed II, is fout.
I is fout, II is goed.
I en II zijn beide fout.

prompt.body:
In welke zin/zinnen is de present continuous gebruikt?
I What are you doing this evening?
II Come on, we're waiting for you.

Kies de juiste vormen van het werkwoord.
Sshht, I ...... (watch) TV. You know that I always ...... (watch) TV on Saturdays.

Kies de juiste vormen van het werkwoord.
Sam, what ...... you ...... (do)? I ...... (swim) with my clothes on.

Kies de juiste vormen van het werkwoord.
I ...... (work) in an office from 9 to 5, but at the moment I ...... (work not).

items.content:
• Have you filled in your Workplan yet?
  • What went right and what was difficult?
  • Did you learn new words?
  • Have you written those new words in your notebook yet?
  • Continue with www.duolingo.nl

Learn the useful shopping phrases from Clothes Shop (3). Translate (vertaal) them for yourself.

Learn Toolbox - Grammar Simple Present and Present Continuous.

Learn Shopping Numbers and C.

Print and Do worksheet - High Street Wordsearch

Finish all exercises from this lesson, if you haven't done that already.
